original_text: While Jesus was teaching in the temple courts, he asked, “Why do the teachers of the law say that the Messiah is the son of David?
korean_text: 예수께서 성전에서 가르치실새 대답하여 이르시되 어찌하여 서기관들이 그리스도를 다윗의 자손이라 하느냐

sentences.original_text: While Jesus was teaching in the temple courts
Why do the teachers of the law say
that the Messiah is the son of David?
